summary: This is an email from Bobbi C Sterne to USANYS, with a courtesy copy of an ECF filing related to the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330). The email includes attachments of the filing and an HTML file.

persons.name: Bobbi C Sterne
persons.role: Sender of email with court filing
persons.context: Sends a courtesy copy of an ECF filing related to the Maxwell case to USANYS.

persons.name: Christian
persons.context: Copied on an email containing a court filing in the Maxwell case.

events.title: ECF Filing in Maxwell Case
events.description: An electronic court filing (ECF) was made in the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330).

keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 1, 2021, regarding the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330).
Bobbi C Sterne sent a courtesy copy of an ECF filing to USANYS, with Christian copied.
The email includes attachments: 'Maxwell_Letter_Ret S2_.pdf' and 'ATT00001.htm'.
